submodel.name: Submodel

submodel.description: A sample submodel. In order to estimate the model, please add at least one variable.

argument.name: choice_set
argument.field_description: dataset name or list of choices

argument.name: nested_structure
argument.field_description: python dict with choices (values) assigned to nests (keys)

argument.name: stratum
argument.field_description: variable name or expression of the location set defining assignments of location records to nests.
